# certificateChain

**Instance Property**

An array of objects forming the certificate chain for the currently committed navigation.

## Declaration

```swift
@MainActor var certificateChain: [Any] { get }
```

## Discussion

Each item in the array is a [doc://com.apple.documentation/documentation/Security/SecCertificate] object.
